price: (34) And if you should obey a man like yourselves, indeed, you would then be losers.
arabic: وَلَئِنۡ أَطَعۡتُم بَشَرٗا مِّثۡلَكُمۡ إِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wala-in aṭaʿtum basharan mith'lakum innakum idhan lakhāsirūna
